title: Gene Expression Study of TLR Responses on Dendritic Cells

producedBy.name: Gene Expression Study of TLR Responses on Dendritic Cells

studyGroups.name: mice for JAWS II cell line

usesReagent.name: Bio-Plex Pro Mouse Cytokine 23-plex Assay kit

creators.name: Multiscale Systems Immunology for Adjuvant Development

values.value: Use of TLR ligands as adjuvants to modulate host immune responses.  The offerors will study: 1. murine dendritic cell and CD4 T cell responses to a variety of adjuvant/rPA complexes in vitro, ex vivo in cells harvested from immunization sites, and in situ using 2-photon microscopy and laser-capture microdissection.  Human studies: Analysis of gene expression and phenotypic changes from CD4 T cells isolated from Vaxgen anthrax vaccine trial participants.  Comparative studies provide data to begin to make the computational models predictive of human responses (based on animal data).  https://www.fpds.gov/ezsearch/search.do?s=FPDS&q=%22IT+strategy%22+OR+%22enterprise+architecture%22+DEPARTMENT_FULL_NAME%3A%22HEALTH+AND+HUMAN+SERVICES%2C+DEPARTMENT+OF%22+PIID%3A%22HHSD2002011F41972%22+VENDOR_ADDRESS_ZIP_CODE%3A%22221027508%22+GLOBAL_VENDOR_NAME%3A%22GAVER+TECHNOLOGIES++INC.%22+VENDOR_FULL_NAME%3A%22VANGENT%2C+INC.%22+TREASURY_ACCOUNT_SYMBOL%3A%22750885%22+CONTRACTING_OFFICE_NAME%3A%22NIH%2C+NIAID+DEA+OA+OFC+ACQUISITIONS%22+VENDOR_FULL_NAME%3A%22ST.+LOUIS+UNIVERSITY%22+PRODUCT_OR_SERVICE_CODE%3A%22AB93%22+PRINCIPAL_NAICS_CODE%3A%22325414%22+VENDOR_ADDRESS_ZIP_CODE%3A%22277088990%22+PIID%3A%22HHSN266200500019C%22&indexName=awardfull&templateName=1.4.4

availability: Available for download after registration with ImmPort

dimensions.description: LPS effect on JAWS II cells
In Vitro time series response of murine dendritic cells to LPS and CD40L challenge
In vitro time series response of murine dendritic cells to Papain and CpG challenge
In vitro time series response of murine dendritic cells to Papain challenge
JAWS II cells were treated with LPS and at different time after the treatment the culture supernatants were harvested for detection of cytokines
Murine CD11c+ dendritic cells were isolated and treated with LPS. At different time after the treatment the culture supernatants were harvested for detection of cytokines.
JAWSII cells were treated with LPS in the presence of anti-TNF-alpha antibodies and the culture supernatants were assayed for detection of various cytokines
JAWSII cells were treated with TNF-alpha and the culture supernatants were assayed for detection of various cytokines
Murine CD11c+ dendritic cells were treated with CpG and Papain. At different time after the treatment the culture supernatants were harvested for detection of cytokines
Murine CD11c+ dendritic cells were treated with Papain. At different time after the treatment the culture supernatants were harvested for detection of cytokines

distributions.title: Gene Expression Study of TLR Responses on Dendritic Cells
